title: Mary Tyler Moore
summary: Mary Tyler Moore (December 29, 1936 – January 25, 2017) was an American actress, producer, and social advocate. She was widely known for her prominent television sitcom roles in The Dick Van Dyke Show (1961–1966) and The Mary Tyler Moore Show (1970–1977).[1][2][3] She received seven Primetime Emmy Awards and three Golden Globe Awards.
